amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.__. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to enter into a contract, memorandum of understanding, or cooperative agreement with, make a grant to, or provide a loan or loan guarantee to Rosoboronexport.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to enter into a contract, memorandum of understanding, or cooperative agreement with, make a grant to, or provide a loan or loan guarantee to Rosoboronexport.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moran amendment (A046) Agreed to by recorded vote: 407 - 5 (Roll no. 490).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Moran amendment (A046) Agreed to by recorded vote: 407 - 5 (Roll no. 490).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A046) offered by Mr. Moran.
